name: 陳煒朋
objective: 為培育學生瞭解當前投資決策與理財之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的投資決策模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其證券投資分析、金融工具分析、企業評價及資本市場之基本與技術分析等決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的投資專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
schedule:
Week 1 Overview
Week 2 Introduction to Visual Basic for Application (VBA)
Week 3 VBA Essentials
Week 4 Sub and Function Procedures
Week 5 Debugging VBA Codes
Week 6 Building VBA Models
Week 7 Objects and Add-Ins
Week 8 Information from the Web
Week 9 Midterm Examination (期中考)
Week 10 Corporate Finance Models (Financial Statement Modeling)
Week 11 Corporate Finance Models (Financial Planning)
Week 12 Corporate Finance Models (Stock Valuation)
Week 13 Corporate Finance Models (Bond Valuation)
Week 14 Portfolio Models (Portfolio Optimization)
Week 15 Portfolio Models (Efficient Portfolio)
Week 16 Portfolio Models (Value-at-Risk)
Week 17 Portfolio Models (Options Pricing Models)
Week 18 Final Examination (期末考)
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam (期中考): 35%
Final Exam (期末考): 35%
Assignment (作業與報告): 30%
materials:
Benninga, S., “Financial Modeling” 3rd Edition. (指南書局)
Sengupta, C., “Financial Analysis and Modeling Using EXCEL and VBA” 2nd Edition. (東華書局)
Bodie, Z., A. Kane, and A.J. Marcus, (2013), Essentials of Investments, 9/e, McGraw-Hill. (華泰書局)
姜林杰幺，金融資訊管理：分析與系統設計，新陸書局。
姜林杰幺，程式交易：方法與實務應用，新陸書局。
姜林杰幺，理財規劃：分析與系統實作，新陸書局。
